physical_appearance:This is a triangular-shaped bib. It has a string attached to the top. The bib is made of a patchwork of various fabrics. It has a purple striped border down the left and right side.
subject_terms_1:flowers (motifs) embroidery (visual works) Peranakan childrenswear

subject_terms_3:Peranakan costumes
sgcool_label_text:This triangular-shaped bib is made from a patchwork of various fabrics. It would have been tied around the neck of the child. It is part of a donation which contains a mixture of garments worn by Peranakan men and women.
